date: 2024.08.28 There is a bug in version https://github.com/FCL-Team/FoldCraftLauncher/actions/runs/10588078504 There is a bug in version

content.text:
There is a bug in version 1.1.7.7. If you find that the launcher automatically exits when deleting text, you can download this fix. 
 https://github.com/FCL-Team/FoldCraftLauncher/actions/runs/10588078504

在1.1.7.7中有一个bug，如果你发现当你在删除文本的时候启动器自动退出，你可以下载这个修复版。
 https://github.com/FCL-Team/FoldCraftLauncher/actions/runs/10588078504
